file_content.text: Report to Major Dresid for further orders!
Fantastic work!
Report to Major Dresid immediately!
Stand fast! Identity confirmation... complete! Prepare for priority Republic request!
Your presence is requested immediately for a priority discussion with Supreme Chancellor Saresh!
The Chancellor seeks assistance with cessation of illegal arms trade--further details are classified! Report to Major Vom Dresid immediately to initiate this priority meeting!
The Chancellor won't be kept waiting.
Of course.
Always happy to help the Republic's movers and shakers.
Of course.
Priority request receipt confirmed! Good day!
Who are these arms dealers? Hutts? Independents?
What are we up against?
Is this an actual in-person meeting? The Chancellor came here?
A meeting, not a call?
The response to this question is classified!
This sounds more like police work than a military matter.
Why get a soldier for this?
Personnel selection was based on specific skill factors, all of which are classified!
I'm not sure stopping the illegal arms trade is in my best interests.
This sounds bad for business.
Discussion of moral relativities is outside the scope of my assignment!
You have no authority to give me orders.
Don't boss me around.
Invalid complaint: Command authority is unnecessary as no orders are being issued! This is a priority request!
I think you have me confused with someone who takes orders.
Don't boss me around.
Reconfirming identity... complete! Request for priority discussion stands!
Report to Major Dresid as soon as possible!
Carry on!
